Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

The minions pile out of the airlock into the void of space.  Down below was the planet Earth, and on the surface were their enemies, the Maximals.  Splattercannon transformed into his gunship mode, Necross manuvered to where he was directly above the ship and Splattercannon began to enter the atmosphere.  As the heat began to build up, Necross cast a glance over his shoulder to see if he others were following.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:BlackNightmare/Darkfate/NightStrike:


"It's show time,"said BlackNightmare with a devilish smile as she flew toward the exit followed by DarkFate and NightStrike.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
The last minion opened a channel to her five brethren
"Hurry up, Unicron will not wait!  Go and attack those Maximals before I have to get down there and motivate you!"
Necross, already in a foul humor, snapped back.
"Well why don't you get down here and do it for us, then!"
"Because Unicron wants you to, not me.  That is why I am staying here."
Necross grudgingly went silent as Splattercannon opened the outer door, exposing the five minions to the vacuum of outerspace.  
"Let's go, I want to destroy something!"
Necross shook his head, Splattercannon was an enthusiastic idiot.
"Let's go then!  We are wasting my time!" 


"Souls!  Give your strength!  Give me your power!  Strike your revenge with Omni- Savior Slash!" -Victortegon the Angel of Darkness' Destruction
